Download recovery.img in download link
Reboot phone to bootloader
Open any terminal like cmd etc, enter "fastboot flash recovery recovery.img"
Reboot phone to recovery and enter sideload mode
Enter "adb sideload xxx" (xxx means the filename of rom zip you downloaded)
Do factory reset in recovery (Mandatory for first time flash)
Reboot
You can also use rom installer to flash the way you did before.



For root:

Download Magisk apk
Rename it to *.zip
Reboot to recovery and enter sideload mode
Enter "adb sideload xxx.zip" (xxx means magisk file name)
You can also patch boot.img and flash via fastboot.

  1. Connect to PC and boot to bootloader 
    1

    $ adb reboot bootloader
  2. Boot recovery 
    1

    $ fastboot boot twrp.img
  3. Advanced wipe data and cache, format data, factory reset and reboot to bootloader
  4. Repeat step 1, 2, 3
  5. Boot recovery
  6. Flash OOS, flash twrp, reboot to recovery
  7. Repeat step 6
  8. Reboot to system, enable Developer Options and USB Debugging, reboot to recovery
  9. Flash Syberia OS Android 10, flash twrp, advanced wipe data and cache, reboot to recovery
  10. Flash gapps, reboot to system, enable Developer Options and USB Debugging, reboot to recovery
  11. Repeat step 9, 10
  12. Flash Syberia OS Android 11, flash twrp, advanced wipe data and cache, reboot to recovery
  13. Flash gapps, reboot to system
